basic_information.scholarship_name: Garry Ritzky Memorial Scholarship - Sponsored by Oklahoma Chapter of RIMS Scholarship

description: The Garry Ritzky Memorial Scholarship - Sponsored by the Oklahoma Chapter of RIMS is open to full-time undergraduate students. Students must have a declared major in Insurance & Risk Management, a minor in Insurance, or a minor in Risk Management. Financial need to be considered. Eligibility Requirements Declared major in Insurance OR a minor in Insurance, or a minor in Risk Management Full-time undergraduate Selection Process Financial need to be considered

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
